features: | RAZOR-SHARP BLADE | Our chefs knife is a must-have for any home cook or restaurant professional. With a super sharp blade, the kitchen knifes can be used for almost any cooking task, from precisely slicing vegetables, meats, or fish into pieces!

| ERGONOMIC HANDLE | The handle shape of our Japanese knife is designed for a secure grip, no matter how slippery or wet your hands are. Our Damascus chef knife ergonomic handle is comfortable for any hand size!
| HIGH CARBON STAINLESS STEEL KNIFE| The blade of our sharp knife is crafted to never rust, scratch, or chip so that the cooking knife will look intact after years of heavy daily use!
| PREMIUM DESIGN| The stunning design of this chef knife 8 inch will make it a stylish addition to any kitchen decor. The blade of our large knife has a beautiful Damascus pattern.

| BUY WITH CONFIDENCE| At YEHOK, we take great pride in the quality of our 8 inch chef knife. We provide 10 years manufacturer's warranty so that you can purchase our sharp knives with the most confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OUTSTANDING QUALITY A Professional Chef Knife is an essential tool that can be used in both commercial kitchens and at home. Whether you're an experienced cook or just getting started, these professional chef knives will make food preparation simpler and more fun! With the extremely sharp blade, the chefs knives will easily cut any ingredient needed for the meal! Weighting 0.73lb, with a blade length of 8" and an overall length of 13", this knife for kitchen is designed for all-day use without fatigue. The handle of these sharp kitchen knives is designed for a secure and proper hold, no matter the conditions. The comfortable handle of our sharp Japanese chef knife provides maximum control and precision. With impeccable craftsmanship, this chef's knife will look new for years, without scratches and chips.

MULTIPLE USES This accomplished sharp meat cutting knife can also intricately slice vegetables or fish and finely chop nuts, fruits, or chocolate into pieces! With multiple cutting damascus knife handle colors available, you can find the perfect match for your personality and sense of style. COMFORTABLE HANDLE We worked closely alongside world-renowned chefs from France and Japan to created a professional knife ergonomic handle that is perfect for any hand size! This way, you can use the chopping knife with confidence and precision. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, these Damascus chef knives will make food prep easier and more enjoyable! TOP-GRADE STAINLESS STEEL The blade of our sharpest knife is made from high carbon 7Cr17MoV stainless steel, which means it will remain sharp for a while. The tough blade is made with high quality stainless steel that will maintain its edge for an incredibly long time. The cutting knife will effortlessly cut through any ingredient that you have in the kitchen! This meat knife is easy to clean, simply handwash it with soap and rinse it under cold water.

ELEGANT DESIGN The intricate design of these Damascus steel chef knives will make them an eye-catching addition to any kitchen decor. The blade of our kitchen steel knives is fashioned with an elegant Damascus pattern, which imitates the style of ancient knives. You can find the perfect fit for your style with multiple cutting knife for cooking color handle options.

¡Descubre la excelencia culinaria con nuestro cuchillos para cocina! Nuestro cuchillo de cocina japonés combina un diseño elegante con un rendimiento excepcional. Con una hoja ultra afilada de acero inoxidable de alta calidad y un mango ergonómico, este cuchillos de cocina profesional ofrece un agarre seguro y un control preciso en cada corte. Desde picar finamente verduras hasta rebanar carnes y pescados con precisión, este cuchillo es imprescindible en la cocina de cualquier chef o entusiasta culinario. Con una presentación impecable en una caja de regalo elegante, es el regalo perfecto para cualquier ocasión. Experimenta la calidad y el estilo de nuestro cuchillos para chef y eleva tus habilidades culinarias a otro nivel.

PERFECT GIFT If you're looking for a Chef gift, look no further than this amazing Japanese kitchen knife. The chef kitchen knife comes in an elegant giftable box that can be wrapped with ease for any holiday! We thoroughly inspect each step in the manufacturing process for any imperfections, ensuring that your cooking knives will be flawless when they arrive at your place!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent but huge!
reviews.reviewText: I did like the knife overall. For the price, it wasn't too bad, but I could find a nicer knife for the same price in my opinion.That being said, it is exactly what it says it is. It doesn't feel particularly flimsy, it is a large knife and has some weight (though not an absurd amount).The handle is nice, beautiful colors and feels solid. It is certainly not going anywhere.My only complaint aesthetically is the fake "Damascus" engraves. It is clearly a Stainless Steel knife, there was no real reason to laser etch Damascus markings. It only looks like Damascus from preeetty far away, but up close it is not so appealing.There is nothing wrong with the etching, I just would rather have had this knife as a plain polished stainless steel blade.It is sharp enough to use for most people's home kitchen needs. Just be sure to read the measurements, and actually take a ruler so you can see what you are getting into. 8 inches is a fairly large kitchen knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Sharp and Well-Made
reviews.reviewText: This knife is well-made and very sharp. It should be hand washed and sharpened regularly to maintain its performance. 5-Star rating due to excellent customer service and it really is a beautiful and quality knife. Overall for this price, it’s a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this knife
reviews.reviewText: Super sharp, great grip and more importantly than anything else- great customer service!I reached out via instagram to the manufacturer due to a small issue and they were very kind and generous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its made in China
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to buy a knife made in Japan because I like their quality. And give one to my sister for xmas. I don’t like that the seller lied to get me to buy. Even if it turns out to be a good knife, then you wouldn’t have to lie. The product should stand on its own. So I’m skeptical of the quality already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this a gift for my husband and he’s a chef and he loves it. The color and helm of the knife was so good his coworkers were in awe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice but not near as sharp as I thought!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my daughter
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this knife. It's well balanced and works perfectly.
